remarks: A more general version of ~ axdc3 that allows the function ` F ` to vary with ` k ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2013.)
statement:
axdc4.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
axdc4 $p |- ( ( C e. A /\ F : ( _om X. A ) --> ( ~P A \ { (/) } ) ) -> E. g ( g : _om --> A /\ ( g ` (/) ) = C /\ A. k e. _om ( g ` suc k ) e. ( k F ( g ` k ) ) ) ) $.
$d A g k $.
$d C g k $.
$d F g k $.
